api_list.name: Collect Comment Metrics
api_list.description: # Get Metrics on Wallstreetbet Reddit comments
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wsb-metrics.p.rapidapi.com/metrics/collect/comments"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wsb-metrics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
